Package api

Class Accommodation

  • java.lang.Object
    • api.Accommodation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Accommodation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class includes all the accommodation's functions. Creates, edits, deletes an accommodation object.
    See Also:
